00045 //
00046 // This class implements a HTTP protocol client.
00047 // It's able to send GET, POST and HEAD requests,
00048 // download stuff to a file or to a qt SLOT().
00049 //
00050 
00051 class KVILIB_API KviHttpRequest : public QObject, public KviHeapObject
00052 {
00053         Q_OBJECT
00054 public:
00055         enum ProcessingType
00056         {
00057                 HeadersOnly,    // Download headers only (HEAD request)
00058                 WholeFile,      // Emit the data as whole file (binaryData() is emitted)
00059                 Blocks,         // Emit the data as blocks (binaryData() is emitted)
00060                 Lines,          // Emit the data as ASCII text lines (the client must take care of decoding the data)
00061                 StoreToFile     // Store the data to a file
00062         };
00063         enum ExistingFileAction
00064         {
00065                 Overwrite,      // Overwrite existing file
00066                 RenameIncoming, // Automatically rename the incoming file
00067                 RenameExisting, // Automatically rename the existing file
00068                 Resume          // Attempt to resume the file (get partial content)
00069         };
00070 public:
00071         KviHttpRequest();
00072         ~KviHttpRequest();
00073 protected:
00074         // data
00075         KviUrl                 m_url;
00076         QString                m_szFileName;
00077         ProcessingType         m_eProcessingType;
00078         ExistingFileAction     m_eExistingFileAction;
00079         void                 * m_pPrivateData;
00080         unsigned int           m_uMaxContentLength;
00081         unsigned int           m_uContentOffset;
00082         QString                m_szPostData;
00083         // status
00084         QString                m_szLastError;
00085         unsigned int           m_uTotalSize;
00086         unsigned int           m_uReceivedSize;
00087         // internal status
00088         QString                m_szIp;
00089         KviDns               * m_pDns;
00090         KviHttpRequestThread * m_pThread;
00091         KviDataBuffer        * m_pBuffer;
00092         bool                   m_bHeaderProcessed;
00093         bool                   m_bChunkedTransferEncoding;
00094         bool                   m_bGzip;
00095         unsigned int           m_uRemainingChunkSize;
00096         bool                   m_bIgnoreRemainingData; // used in chunked transfer after the last chunk has been seen
00097         KviFile              * m_pFile;
00098         unsigned int           m_uConnectionTimeout; // in seconds, 60 secs by default
00099 protected:
00100         bool startDnsLookup();
00101         virtual bool event(QEvent *e);
00102         void processData(KviDataBuffer * data);
00103         bool processHeader(KviStr &szHeader);
00104         bool openFile();
00105         void emitLines(KviDataBuffer * pDataBuffer);
00106 
00107         void resetStatus();
00108         void resetData();
00109         void resetInternalStatus();
00110 protected slots:
00111         void dnsLookupDone(KviDns *d);
00112         void haveServerIp();
00113 public:
00114         void setConnectionTimeout(unsigned int uConnectionTimeout)
00115         {
00116                 m_uConnectionTimeout = uConnectionTimeout;
00117                 if(m_uConnectionTimeout < 5)
00118                         m_uConnectionTimeout = 5; // keep it sane
00119         }
00120 
00121         const KviUrl & url(){ return m_url; };
00122         ProcessingType processingType(){ return m_eProcessingType; };
00123         ExistingFileAction existingFileAction(){ return m_eExistingFileAction; };
00124         const QString &fileName(){ return m_szFileName; };
00125         void * privateData(){ return m_pPrivateData; };
00126         unsigned int maxContentLength(){ return m_uMaxContentLength; };
00127         unsigned int contentOffset(){ return m_uContentOffset; };
00128         unsigned int totalSize(){ return m_uTotalSize; };
00129         unsigned int receivedSize(){ return m_uReceivedSize; };
00130 
00131         void reset();
00132 
00133         void setPostData(const QString &szPostData){ m_szPostData = szPostData; };
00134         void setUrl(const KviUrl &u){ m_url = u; };
00135         void setProcessingType(ProcessingType t){ m_eProcessingType = t; };
00136         void setExistingFileAction(ExistingFileAction a){ m_eExistingFileAction = a; };
00137         void setFileName(const QString &szFileName){ m_szFileName = szFileName; };
00138         void setPrivateData(void * ptr){ m_pPrivateData = ptr; };
00139         void setMaxContentLength(int uMaxContentLength){ m_uMaxContentLength = uMaxContentLength; }; //0 means unlimited
00140         // this will work regardless of ExistingFileAction : even if the file doesn't exist
00141         void setContentOffset(int uContentOffset){ m_uContentOffset = uContentOffset; };
00142 
00143         bool start();
00144 
00145         // this is a shortcut for reset()+setUrl()+setProcessingType()+setFileName()+start()
00146         bool get(const KviUrl &u,ProcessingType p = WholeFile,const QString &szFileName = QString());
00147 
00148         const QString & lastError(){ return m_szLastError; };
00149 
00150         void abort();
00151 signals:
00152         void resolvingHost(const QString &hostname);
00153         void contactingHost(const QString &ipandport);
00154         void connectionEstabilished();
00155         void receivedResponse(const QString &response);
00156 
00157         void terminated(bool bSuccess);
00158 
00159 
00160         void status(const QString &message);
00161         void data(const KviStr &data);
00162         void binaryData(const KviDataBuffer &data);
00163         void header(KviPointerHashTable<const char *,KviStr> * hdr);
00164         void requestSent(const QStringList &request);
00165 };

00169 {
00170         friend class KviHttpRequest;

00172         enum RequestMethod { Post, Get, Head };

00175                         const QString &szHost,
00176                         const QString &szIp,
00177                         unsigned short uPort,
00178                         const QString &szPath,
00179                         unsigned int uContentOffset,
00180                         RequestMethod m,
00181                         const QString &szPostData = QString(),
00182                         bool bUseSSL = false
00183                 );
00184 
00185 public:
00186         ~KviHttpRequestThread();
00187 protected:
00188         KviHttpRequest * m_pRequest;
00189

00191         QString          m_szIp;
00192         QString          m_szPath;
00193         unsigned int     m_uContentOffset;
00194         RequestMethod    m_eRequestMethod;
00195         QString          m_szPostData;
00196

00198         kvi_socket_t     m_sock;
00199         bool             m_bUseSSL;
00200         unsigned int     m_uConnectionTimeout;

00205         void setConnectionTimeout(unsigned int uTimeout)
00206         {
00207                 m_uConnectionTimeout = uTimeout;
00208                 if(m_uConnectionTimeout < 5)
00209                         m_uConnectionTimeout = 5; // keep it sane
00210         }

00213         bool readDataStep();
00214         bool sendBuffer(const char *buffer,int bufLen,int iTimeoutInSecs);
00215         bool failure(const char *error=0);
00216         bool sslFailure();
00217         bool selectForWrite(int iTimeoutInSecs);
00218         bool connectToRemoteHost();
00219         bool processInternalEvents();
00220         void runInternal();
00221         virtual void run();
00222 };
